TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ArrangedElementCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
type ArrangedElementCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示对象的集合，这些对象在设计图面上或在父 内排列。The class represents a collection of objects arranged on a design surface or inside a parent . 中没有公开定义的构造函数，因为它设计为仅在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]内部使用。There are no publicly defined constructors in because it is designed to be used only internally within the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 但是，开发人员可以使用派生自 的类，如 。However, classes derived from , such as , are available to the developer.

threadsafe.span: 此类型的公共 （ Visual Basic）成员是线程安全的。

span.span: Public ( in Visual Basic) members of this type are thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 实例成员不一定是线程安全的。

span.span: Instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 只要没有修改集合， 就可以同时支持多个读取器。

span.span: An can support multiple readers concurrently, as long as the collection is not modified.

threadsafe.span: 方法返回可用于访问元素的 。

span.span: The method returns an that can be used to access elements.

threadsafe.span: 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。

span.span: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.

threadsafe.span: 即使集合是同步的，其他线程仍可以修改集合，这会导致枚举器引发异常。

span.span: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads could still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.

threadsafe.span: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。

span.span: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.

span.span: Copies the entire contents of this collection to a compatible one-dimensional , starting at the specified index of the target array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定数组的类型必须与源集合兼容。The type of the specified array must be compatible with the source collection. 此方法使用 方法复制元素。This method uses the method to copy the elements.

summary.span: 返回一个用于访问整个集合的枚举数。

span.span: Returns an enumerator for the entire collection.

returns.span: 一个用于访问整个集合的 。

span.span: An for the entire collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，枚举器不具有对集合的独占访问权限;因此，枚举集合本质上不是线程安全的过程。Typically the enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使集合是同步的，其他线程仍可以修改集合，这会导致枚举器引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads could still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要保证枚举过程中的线程安全，可以遵循以下策略之一：To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can follow one of the following strategies: - 使用 在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。Lock the collection during the entire enumeration using a . - 捕获并处理由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。Catch and handle the exceptions that result from changes made by other threads.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示集合是否是只读的。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the collection is read-only.

value.span: 如果集合为只读，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the collection is read-only; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在创建集合后，只读集合不允许添加、移除或修改元素。A read-only collection does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created. 只读集合就是一个集合，其中包含阻止修改集合的包装器。A read-only collection is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents modifying the collection. 如果对基础集合进行了更改，只读集合将反映这些更改。If changes are made to the underlying collection, the read-only collection reflects those changes.
